column5: Hope everyone has had a good day. You find yourself at @KenaiFjordsNPS in Alaska. Are you in a dream? Are you awake? It's almost midnight but the sky is still filled with an eerie dreamlike light. The land of the midnight sun allows for endless dreamy hours of glacier watching moments.Pic by Angela Feldhaus pic.twitter.com/Gl3SvU8fme Iâ€™m helping my parents with some tech stuff this evening. Fun times!
